html > body > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h3:nth-child(2)

html > body > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > form:nth-child(4) > h3:nth-child(13)

html > body > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > form:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(23) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > iframe
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
